sentences.english: Thick spears of asparagus and fennel were draped with thinly sliced ham.
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的芦笋和茴香夹在切的薄薄的火腿片里。

sentences.english: Rinse the baby carrot and asparagus, and chop into small dices. Set aside.
sentences.chinese: 小甘笋及芦笋洗净后切小粒，备用。

sentences.english: Cook risotto for a further 2 minutes until asparagus and peas are tender.
sentences.chinese: 继续翻炒意饭2分钟，一直把芦笋和青豆炒熟。

sentences.english: Asparagus, Orange, Roasted pumpkin, Lettuce, Honey vinaigrette.
sentences.chinese: 芦笋，橙，烤南瓜，生菜，蜂蜜香醋。

sentences.english: In this manuscript, the effects of the stabilizers on the stability of asparagus compounded juice were studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了稳定剂对芦笋复合果蔬汁的稳定性的影响。

sentences.english: You might be able to grow asparagus in it really well.
sentences.chinese: 你也许能在火星上把芦笋种得很好。

sentences.english: Sakura shrimp, green bamboo shoots, green peas, rice, seared red shrimp, white asparagus.
sentences.chinese: 樱花虾绿竹笋青都炊饭搭配煎红虾及白芦笋。

sentences.english: But then again, so does asparagus.
sentences.chinese: 但话又说回来，芦笋也是如此。

sentences.english: She's now a fan of green beans and asparagus. She has learned to love steak.
sentences.chinese: 她现在爱上了四季豆和芦笋，也开始喜欢上了牛排。

sentences.english: Poached Asparagus, Potato Puree, Three Citrus Beurre Blanc.
sentences.chinese: 煮芦笋，土豆泥，柑橘牛油沙司。

sentences.english: Cucumber, Baby Carrots, Asparagus, Artichoke Hearts, and Cherry Tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜，小胡萝卜，芦笋，亚枝竹芯和樱桃番茄。

sentences.english: Study on compound juice of aloe and apple;
sentences.chinese: 研究了芦笋复合汁的加工工艺和配方。

sentences.english: Smoked salmon, fennel & asparagus salad, mustard dressing.
sentences.chinese: 烟熏三文鱼，茴香，芦笋色拉配芥末调味汁。

sentences.english: Baked white asparagus pasta with egg cream, tagliatelle with poppy seeds and prosciutto.
sentences.chinese: 烘焙白芦笋意面配蛋蜜乳，罂粟籽火腿意式扁面。

definition: variant of 西蘭花|西兰花[xi1 lan2 hua1]
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
